channel.title: Zacks Rank on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Zacks Rank on FinanClub

item.title: DELL
item.description: score:17 Chances: Dell Technologies (DELL) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects. The PC and server maker is still a stable long-term investment. Dell Technologies (DELL) is riding on a robust portfolio and an expanding network of partners that is expected to drive top-line growth.

item.title: FHN
item.description: score:6 Chances: First Horizon (FHN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended December 2023, indicating potential positive performance. The price-to-sales ratio suggests that stocks like FHN hold promise, especially for early development cycle investments. Upgrades to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) reflect growing optimism about First Horizon (FHN) earnings prospects.
